hero.title: LOSL-CON 2025
hero.subtitle: Conference dedicated to cybersecurity, open source and Linux

about.heading: About LOSL-CON
about.body: LOSL-CON is a community event focused on digital freedom, security, and the adoption of open source & Linux technologies. We bring together enthusiasts, professionals, and curious minds to learn, share, and build a freer and safer digital future.

freedom.title: Digital freedom
freedom.desc: Promote technological autonomy, privacy, and control of one’s data.

security.title: Security
security.desc: Strengthen cybersecurity practices and system resilience.

open.title: Open source & Linux
open.desc: Encourage usage, contribution, and sharing around open source and Linux.

join.heading: Stay informed
join.text: Join the community to get the latest news, registration opening announcements and participation opportunities.
join.scan: Scan the QR for the waitlist

sponsor.title: Become a sponsor – LOSL-CON 2025
sponsor.subtitle: Reach an engaged audience. Boost your visibility. Hire your next talents.
